articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: Scientist speaks out about coronavirus origin: exclusive
articles.description: NBC’s Richard Engel speaks with Dr. Danielle Anderson, a virologist who has isolated the coronavirus that causes COVID-19 at her Singapore lab.  Her research into the virus’s origin points to bats at animal markets.

articles.author: NBCNews.com
articles.title: First U.S. trial for coronavirus treatment begins
articles.description: The University of Nebraska Medical Center’s first patient is an individual  who got off a quarantined cruise ship in Japan. Eventually, 400 patients will be in the trial worldwide.
